adjectives.description: downstate (comparative more downstate, superlative most downstate)

entries.meaning: (US) Of the southern section of a state.

adverbs.description: downstate (comparative more downstate, superlative most downstate)

entries.meaning: (US) To the southern section of a state.
(US) The southern region of certain US states, particularly Michigan, New York, and Illinois.
examples: The final election returns from downstate may not be available until late Wednesday morning.
